articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Pak Song Chol
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Pak Song Chol
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, sent a wreath to the bier of Pak Song Chol, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK and honorary vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, on Wednesday expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: Pak Song Chol Dies
articles.content:
Pak Song Chol Dies
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Pak Song Chol, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and honorary vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, died of long illness at 5 a.m. on Oct. 28 to our regret at the age of 95.
					 He was born in a poor peasant's family in Kyongju City of North Kyongsang Province on September 2, Juche 2 (1913).
					
					He was a faithful revolutionary soldier who devoted his whole life to the cause of national liberation and working class liberation and socialist construction and the independent reunification of the country under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					He conducted positive underground operational activities after joining different revolutionary organizations since the spring of 1930. After joining the Korean People's Revolutionary Army in April 1934 he carried out energetic party political work and military activities as a competent military and political worker, thus contributing to expanding and strengthening the anti-Japanese armed ranks and wiping out the Japanese imperialist aggressor forces.
					
					 After the liberation of the country Pak held important posts at a local power organ and the People's Army. During the Fatherland Liberation War he was active as a divisional commander of the KPA, deputy commander of the Navy Command and director of the Reconnaissance Department of the Supreme Command, thus making a great contribution to beating back the U.S. imperialists' armed invasion and ensuring the victory in the war. 
					
					 In the postwar period he worked hard to implement the foreign policy of the WPK, holding posts of DPRK ambassador to other country, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, department director of the Central Committee of the WPK and vice-premier of the Cabinet and concurrently foreign minister.
					
					 He worked as vice-premier of the Administration Council from July of 1973 and its premier from April of 1976 and vice-president of the DPRK from December of 1977 and honorary vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly from September of 1998.
					
					 Pak was elected member of the C.C., the WPK in September 1961 and alternate member of the Political Committee of the C.C., the WPK in June 1964 and member of the Political Committee of the C.C., the WPK in October 1966 and member of the Political Committee and the Presidium of the C.C., the WPK in December 1969 and member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK in October 1980.
					
					 He worked as a deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly since the Second Supreme People's Assembly in 1959.
					
					 He was awarded the title of Hero of the Republic and Kim Il Sung Order, the highest order of the DPRK, and the Order of the National Flag First Class, the Order of Freedom and Independence First Class and many other orders and medals for the distinguished feats performed by him for the Party and the revolution, the country and its people.
					
					 That day an obituary of Pak Song Chol was published in the joint name of the Central Committee of the WPK and the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet of the DPRK.
					
					The obituary noted that Pak's whole life was the life of a Juche-type revolutionary who devotedly worked for the Party and the leader and the country and its people, adding that though he passed away, the precious exploits performed by him for the WPK and the revolutionary cause will always be remembered.
					
					The C.C., the WPK, the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and the DPRK Cabinet announced that a state funeral would be held for the late Pak and formed a state funeral committee with Kim Yong Nam as its chairman and Jo Myong Rok and 63 others as its members.
					
					 The funeral committee issued a notice that his coffin is placed in the Sojang Hall of Pothonggang District, Pyongyang City and will receive condolers from 3 p.m. to 9 p.m. on October 29 and the coffin will leave the hall at 8 a.m. on October 30.

articles.title: Condolences Expressed over Death of Pak Song Chol
articles.content:
Condolences Expressed over Death of Pak Song Chol
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Officials of Party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and people from all walks of life visited the bier of Pak Song Chol, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and honorary vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, on Wednesday expressing deep condolences over his death.
					Placed beside the bier was a wreath sent by Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Also placed there were wreaths sent by the WPK Central Committee, the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, the DPRK Cabinet, armed forces organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, units of the KPA and Party and power organs in Pyongyang. 
					
					Among the condolers were officials of Party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters, servicepersons of the KPA and those of Party and power organs and people of various strata in Pyongyang. 
					
					 They observed a moment's silence in memory of the late Pak and expressed deep condolences to his bereaved families.
					
					 Diplomatic corps and representatives of international organizations here and overseas compatriots staying in the motherland visited the bier of the late Pak to express condolences over his death on the same day.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets FM of Myanmar and His Party
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets FM of Myanmar and His Party
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly talk with U Nyan Win, foreign minister of Myanmar, and his party when they paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today. 
					 Present there were Kim Yong Il, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials concerned.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from FM of Myanmar
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from FM of Myanmar
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the foreign minister of Myanmar on a visit to the DPRK.
					It was handed to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, by Foreign Minister U Nyan Win on Wednesday.

articles.title: Greetings to Turkish President
articles.content:
Greetings to Turkish President
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Abdulah Gul, President of the Republic of Turkey, on Wednesday on the occasion of its national day.
					 In the message, Kim Yong Nam extended warm congratulations to the president and the friendly people of Turkey and wished its people progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Minutes of Talks between Delegations of DPRK and China Signed
articles.content:
Minutes of Talks between Delegations of DPRK and China Signed
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Minutes of talks between the delegation of the DPRK Hydro-Meteorological Service and the delegation of the Chinese Ministry of Water Resources on cooperation in hydrologic service in the Amnok and Tuman rivers were signed here Wednesday.
					 Present there were members of the delegation of the service headed by its Director Ko Il Hun from the DPRK side and members of the Chinese delegation headed by Chief Engineer Liu Ning and an official of the Chinese embassy here from the Chinese side.
					
					 The minutes were signed by Ko Il Hun and Liu Ning.

articles.title: Plan for Cultural Exchange between DPRK and Cambodia Signed
articles.content:
Plan for Cultural Exchange between DPRK and Cambodia Signed
Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- A 2009-2011 plan for cultural exchange between the governments of the DPRK and Cambodia was signed in Phnom Penh on Oct. 27. 
					 Present at the signing ceremony were the members of the friendship delegation of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries led by its Acting Chairman Mun Jae Chol on a visit to Cambodia from the DPRK side and Him Chaem, minister of Culture and Arts of Cambodia, and officials concerned from the Cambodian side.

articles.title: Participants in Women's Meeting Visit Kumsusan Memorial Palace
articles.content:
Participants in Women's Meeting Visit Kumsusan Memorial Palace
Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- The participants in the national meeting of chairpersons of model primary organizations of the Korean Democratic Women's Union visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace Wednesday to pay homage to President Kim Il Sung. 
					 They paid highest tribute to the statue of the President who put forward the women as powerful forces pushing one of the two wheels of the revolutionary chariot.
					
					 They made bows in humble reverence to the President who clearly indicated the road to be followed by the women's movement in every period of the development of the revolution and at its each stage and devoted his all to the final solution of the women's issue.

articles.title: Floral Basket Laid before Kim Il Sung's Statue
articles.content:
Floral Basket Laid before Kim Il Sung's Statue 
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- The participants of the DPRK Red Cross meeting placed a floral basket and bunches of flowers before the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill on Wednesday.
					Written on the ribbon of the floral basket were letters "The great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung will live forever."

articles.title: National Day of Czech Republic Observed
articles.content:
National Day of Czech Republic Observed
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Martin Tomco, Czech ambassador to the DPRK, gave a reception at the Taedonggang Club for the Diplomatic Corps on Oct. 28 on the occasion of the 90th national day of the Czech Republic.
					 Present there on invitation were Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Ri Myong San, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, Hong Son Ok, vice-chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, officials concerned and diplomatic envoys of various countries and staff members of missions of international organizations here.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works Vol.77 Comes Off Press
articles.content:
"Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works" Vol. 77 Off Press
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House brought out "Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works" Vol. 77, a library of the immortal Juche idea, which systematically and comprehensively deals with his works in a chronological order.
					 The book contains 33 works of President Kim Il Sung including his speeches, conclusions and talks between January and June, Juche 72 (1983).
					
					 It comprehensively deals with the outstanding ideas, theories and policies laid down by him to vigorously accelerate socialist construction through the three revolutions -- ideological, technical and cultural -- under the banner of the Juche idea and positively promote the country's reunification and the cause of global independence, and achievements and experience gained in the struggle to embody them. 
					
					 In his work "On the Korean People's Struggle to Apply the Juche Idea" the President explained the historical course in which the immortal Juche idea was founded and developed in depth and put forward the tasks to be fulfilled to realize the modeling of the whole society on the Juche idea.
					
					 "On Establishing the Revolutionary Trait of Upholding and Implementing the Party's Line and Policies and Minutely Organizing the Economic Work" and "A Concluding Speech at the 7th Plenary Meeting of the 6th Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea" and his other works indicate the tasks and ways to accelerate the socialist economic construction. 
					
					 In "On Making a Fresh Advance in Scientific Research" and "On Increasing the Cement Production and Successfully Providing Material Guarantee for Scientific Researches" and other works the President laid down the policy for further developing the nation's    science and technology. 
					
					 "A Congratulatory Message to the 13th Congress of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan" and his other works set forth tasks which would serve as guidelines for the activities of Chongryon including the issue of consolidating the foundation for the future development of the movement of the Koreans in Japan and strengthening its chapters and branches.
					
					 "Talk to the Chief of the Government Council for National Reconstruction of the Republic of Nicaragua, Member of the National Leadership of the Sandinist National Liberation Front of Nicaragua" and "We Highly Appreciate the Successes Made by the Seychellois People in Creating a New Life" and his other works clarify the fundamental principles to be maintained by the non-aligned countries. 
					
					 The book also contains works that deal with various issues arising in the revolution and construction including the task facing all compatriots in the north and the south and overseas to go united and check and frustrate the U.S. imperialists' moves to create "two  Koreas."

articles.title: State Academic Degrees and Titles Conferred on Intellectuals
articles.content:
State Academic Degrees and Titles Conferred on Intellectuals
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- The title of professor was conferred on Ro Chun Sik, director of the Instruction Department of Kim Chaek University of Technology, Ri Pyong Il, room chief of the same university, and others and the degree of doctor on Han Song Chol and Pak Chol Hae, teachers at Kim Il Sung University, and 16 others and the title of associate professor on 63 intellectuals who have made great contributions to scientific researches and the education of the younger generation in the DPRK.
					 An awarding ceremony was held on Oct. 28.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK Military Confab of U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers Blasted
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK Military Confab of U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers Blasted
Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and south Korean military bosses held the 40th U.S.-south Korea "annual security consultative meeting" in Washington on Oct. 17 at which they reaffirmed the "strong defense commitments" of the U.S. to south Korea and adopted a 17-point joint statement the keynote of which is the "rapid dispatch of reinforcements in contingency on the Korean Peninsula". 
					It was the first time since the first meeting of this kind that "provision of reinforcing combat forces" was specially stipulated in the joint statement adopted at the above-said meeting. 
					
					 This comes under fire by a signed commentary of Rodong Sinmun Wednesday. 
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean war-like forces openly held an anti-DPRK military confab at which they agreed to "rapidly dispatch reinforcements in contingency." This was a dangerous move aimed to provoke a new war on the Korean Peninsula and an unpardonable military challenge to the DPRK, to all intents and purposes, the commentary observes, and goes on:
					
					 Some days ago, the commander of the U.S. armed forces in south Korea kicked off war hysteria, crying out for "boosting the capability for perfect retaliation." This indicates that his outbursts are not an empty talk but are being put into practice.
					
					 The "contingency" much touted by the U.S. imperialists is nothing but a pretext to justify their reckless war moves. It is only the United States that seeks to create an emergency situation in the DPRK. These moves are creating such dangerous situation on the peninsula that a war may break out any moment. 
					
					 Availing itself of this opportunity, the DPRK warns the south Korean puppets acting war servants of the U.S. imperialists. 
					
					 These war servants who go reckless to attack fellow countrymen with arms provided by their American master will not escape from the fate of a tiger-moth as they are cursed and denounced by all the fellow countrymen. 
					
					  If the enemy makes a preemptive attack at any cost, the powerful army of Songun and people of the DPRK will deal merciless retaliatory blows at the aggressors. 
					
					 The U.S. belligerent forces would be well advised not to misjudge the army of Songun and the will of the DPRK but stop their reckless moves for a new war.

articles.title: Implementation of Inter-Korean Declarations Called for
articles.content:
Implementation of Inter-Korean Declarations Called for
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might" is an immortal great programme for independent reunification as it correctly set forth important tasks to be fulfilled by the Korean nation in its struggle to achieve national reunification at present. Rodong Sinmun today observes this in a signed article.
					 The work helps the Koreans renew their firm determination to achieve national reunification without fail with strong confidence in victory and optimism as it indicates the most correct orientation and ways to achieve the cause of reunification, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 What is most important for achieving independent reunification at present is for all the Koreans to advance, holding aloft the banner of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration. 
					
					 The north-south relations are in the worst crisis and big hurdles are lying in the way of the movement for national reunification due to the obstructions of the U.S. and the traitorous and anti-reunification moves of the Lee Myung Bak group.
					
					How to approach the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration is a touchstone which distinguishes inter-Korean concord from confrontation, reunification from division. 
					
					All the Koreans should decisively frustrate the moves of the Lee group to bring to naught the successes made in the June 15 era of reunification, negating the validity and vitality of the above-said declarations.
					
					 It is necessary to thoroughly embody the idea of "By our nation itself." 
					
					 All the Koreans in the north and the south and overseas should achieve national unity on the principle of national independence holding aloft the banner of "By our nation itself" and frustrate every move of the anti-reunification forces and certainly achieve the cause of national reunification with the might of idea of "By our nation itself."

articles.title: Part-time Workers' Meeting Held in Seoul
articles.content:
Part-time Workers' Meeting Held in Seoul
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- The 2008 meeting of part-time workers in south Korea was held in Seoul on Oct. 26.
					Speakers at the meeting said that a large number of part-time workers have waged a protracted struggle against the policy of discrimination, adding that this clearly shows what a serious phase their plight has reached.
					
					 Recalling that the present regime is working hard to increase the number of part-timers, not content with 8.7 million part-time workers, they deplored that the Lee Myung Bak group has not taken any measure to settle this problem though they are bled white. 
					
					 They held that the Lee regime and "the Grand National Party" are talking about the "lost decade", but what they have lost is their senses.
					
					 Casting doubt about whether the authorities regard the part-time workers as people, the speakers warned that they would take the lead in the struggle to force the regime to step down unless the authorities repeal the "law on the part-time job."
					
					 They called on all workers to launch united actions for the abolition of the part-time job system in order to bring down the Lee regime and build a society where the workers have become its master.
					
					They raised to the authorities an 8-point demand such as the guarantee of the right to work to the part-time workers, a stop to restructuring, a stable employment through a ban on discharge, the abolition of the "National Security Law" and a halt to suppression under the pretext of "security."
					
					 A resolution on actions was read out at the meeting.

articles.title: WPK Highly Praised
articles.content:
WPK Highly Praised
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) has developed into a guiding force of the Korean people.
					Several personages said this in their speeches at functions held in India, Philippines and Nigeria on Oct. 9 and 14 on the occasion of the 63rd anniversary of the foundation of the WPK.
					
					Vishwanath, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, Harish Gupta, secretary general of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea, P. Shiv Shankar, chairman of the All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association, and S. P. Pathak, chairman of the Indian Society for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il, referred to the fact that President Kim Il Sung founded the immortal Juche idea and the Songun idea, consolidated the organizational and ideological basis for founding a party amid the flame of anti-Japanese war, founded the WPK right after liberation, based on it, and developed it into a guiding force of the Korean people.
					
					 They noted that General Secretary Kim Jong Il has developed in depth the Juche idea and the Songun idea as required by the developing reality and strengthened the WPK as invincible vanguard ranks leading the struggle of the Korean people for building a great prosperous powerful socialist nation and achieving independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					Norma G. Binas, vice-president of the Philippines Solidarity Committee for Peace and Reunification in the Korean Peninsula, stated that the WPK wisely led the struggle of the Korean people for socialist construction on the ruins of war and resolutely frustrated the moves of the U.S. imperialists against the DPRK.
					
					The chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea hoped that the WPK would achieve fresh victories in building a great prosperous powerful socialist nation and achieving the national reunification and the cause of global independence under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Anniversary of Establishment of DPRK-Poland Diplomatic Relations Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Establishment of DPRK-Poland Diplomatic Relations Marked
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- A meeting and a joint performance took place in Warsaw on Oct. 17 on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Poland.
					 On display in the venue of the function were works of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, books and photos showing their undying exploits.
					
					 Present there were figures of the Central Committee of the Poland-Korea Association and various branches of the association and organizations for the study of the Juche idea and personages concerned and other people. 
					
					 Present there on invitation were staff members of the DPRK embassy in Warsaw.
					
					 Andrzej Kozlowski, chairman of the Central Committee of the association, addressing the meeting said that Kim Il Sung liberated the country from the Japanese imperialists' military occupation and founded the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, thus enabling the Korean people to appear with pride as a dignified and independent people in the international arena and take the road of steady development.
					
					 He stressed that the friendly relations between the peoples of the two countries would steadily develop thanks to the historic roots and tradition of friendship provided by Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The reality of the DPRK today proves that the original Songun politics of Kim Jong Il serves as a sure guarantee and a powerful treasured sword for defending the sovereignty of the country and achieving peaceful reunification.
					
					 A joint art performance was staged by Polish artistes and staff members of the embassy.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Pak Song Chol
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Pak Song Chol
 Pyongyang, 29 de octubre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, envio el dia 29 una ofrenda floral al feretro del difunto Pak Song Chol, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y vicepresidente honorario del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC, en senal de  profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: Fallecio Pak Song Chol
articles.content:
Fallecio Pak Song Chol
Pyongyang, 29 de octubre (ATCC) -- Pak Song Chol, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y vicepresidente honorario del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, fallecio lamentablemente a las 5 a.m. del dia 28 a los 95 anos de edad a causa de una enfermedad que le aquejaba largo tiempo.
					Ese dia, fue publicada la esquela mortuoria a nombre comun del CC del PTC, el Presidium de la APS y del Consejo de Ministros, de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Segun ella, Pak nacio el 2 de septiembre del 2 (1913) de la Era Juche en una pobre familia campesina de la ciudad de Kyongju de la provincia de Kyongsang del Norte. 
					
					 Fue fiel soldado revolucionario que bajo la direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung, lucho dedicando toda su vida por el cumplimiento de la causa de liberacion nacional y emancipacion clasista y por la construccion socialista y la reunificacion independiente de la patria.
					
					 Desde la primavera de 1930, se incorporo a varias organizaciones revolucionarias y libro dinamicas actividades clandestinas.
					
					 Despues de alistarse en abril de 1934 en el Ejercito Revolucionario Popular de Corea, desarrollo energicas actividades politicas del partido y las militares siendo competente funcionario militar-politico y contribuyo de esta manera a ampliar y fortalecer las filas armadas antijaponesas y a aniquilar a las tropas invasoras del imperialismo japones.
					
					Despues de la liberacion de la patria (en 1945), trabajo en los importantes cargos de los organos del poder local y del ejercito popular y durante la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, hizo gran aporte a frustrar la invasion armada de los imperialistas yanquis y a asegurar la victoria asumiendo los puestos del jefe de division, subcomandante de la fuerza naval y jefe de la direccion de exploracion de la Comandancia Suprema, del EPC.
					
					 En los tiempos posbelicos, trabajo intensamente para materializar la politica exterior del PTC como embajador acreditado en el extranjero, viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores, jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, vicepremier del Consejo de Ministros y canciller.
					
					 Fue nombrado como viceprimer ministro del Consejo de Administracion en julio de 1973, primer ministro en abril de 1976, vicepresidente de la RPDC en diciembre de 1977 y vicepresidente honorario del Presidium de la APS en septiembre de 1998.
					
					Fue elegido como miembro del CC del PTC en septiembre de 1961, miembro suplente y efectivo  del Comite Politico del CC del PTC en junio de 1964 y en octubre de 1966, respectivamente, miembro del Comite Permanente del Comite Politico del CC del PTC en diciembre de 1969 y miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PTC en octubre de 1980.
					
					 Fue diputado a la APS desde la segunda legislatura en 1959 de este organo legislativo.
					
					 Por sus extraordinarios meritos acumulados por el partido, la revolucion, la patria y el pueblo, fue condecorado con el titulo de Heroe de la Republica, la "Orden Kim Il Sung" -maxima distincion de la RPDC-, la Orden de Bandera Nacional del primer grado, la Orden de Libertad e Independencia del primer grado y otras muchas ordenes y medallas.
					
					 Finalmente, la nota reafirma que toda su vida fue la del revolucionario de tipo jucheano, que lucho abnegadamente por el partido, el lider, la patria y el pueblo y enfatiza que aunque el fallecio, quedaran eternamente sus preciosos meritos de lucha dedicados al PTC y a la causa revolucionaria.
					
					 Ese dia, el CC del PTC, el Presidium de la APS y el Consejo de Ministros, de la RPDC, anunciaron que los funerales del difunto Pak Song Chol se realizaran en forma del acto de homenaje publico y constituyeron el Comite Funerario Estatal con Kim Yong Nam como su presidente, Jo Myong Rok y 63 miembros.
					
					 El comite funeral informo que el feretro reposa en el Club de Sojang del capitalino municipio de Pothonggang y que recibira desde las 15 hasta las 21 del dia 29 a los que visitaran este lugar para despedirse del difunto.
					
					 Igualmente, notifico que el feretro se removera de ese lugar para el entierro a las 8 del dia 30.

articles.title: Expresan profunda condolencia ante feretro de difunto Pak Song Chol
articles.content:
Expresan profunda condolencia ante feretro de difunto Pak Song Chol
Pyongyang, 29 de octubre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del fallecimiento de Pak Song Chol, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y vicepresidente honorario del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder,  organizaciones de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y trabajadores de distintos estratos expresaron este miercoles  condolencias ante el feretro del difunto.
					Al lado del ataud estaba colocada una ofrenda floral enviada por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del PTC, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC y Comandante Supremo del EPC.
					
					Estaban puestas alli las ofrendas florales enviadas por el CC del PTC, el Presidium de la APS de la RPDC, el Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC, organos de las fuerzas armadas, organizaciones de masas, ministerios, organos centrales, unidades del EPC, los organismos del partido y el poder en esta ciudad.
					
					Los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, organizaciones de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, combatientes revolucionarios antijaponeses, oficiales y soldados del ejercito popular, funcionarios de las  instituciones del partido y el poder y trabajadores de distintos estratos en la capital realizaron la visita de condolencia.
					
					Los visitantes guardaron un memento de silencio en  memoria del difundo Pak Song Chol y expresaron profundas condolencias a los familiares del difunto.
					
					Ese dia, el Cuerpo Diplomatico y los representantes de organizaciones internacionales en Corea y coreanos en ultramar de visita en la patria expresaron condolencias ante el feretro del  difunto.

articles.title: Rubricada nota de conversaciones entre Corea y China
articles.content:
Rubricada nota de conversaciones entre Corea y China
Pyongyang, 29 de octubre (ATCC) -- Quedo firmada el dia 29 en esta capital la nota de las conversaciones entre la delegacion de la Direccion Meteorologica e Hidrologica de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la del Ministerio de Recursos Hidrologicos de la Republica Popular China sobre la cooperacion hidrologica de los rios Aprok y Tuman.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana los miembros de la delegacion arriba mencionada presidida por su titular Ko Il Hun, y por la china, los integrantes de susodicha delegacion encabezada por el ingeniero-jefe Liu Ning y un miembro de la embajada de China en Corea. 
					
					Ko Il Hun y Liu Ning suscribieron el documento.

articles.title: Rubricado plan de intercambio cultural Corea-Cambodia
articles.content:
Rubricado plan de intercambio cultural Corea-Cambodia
Pyongyang, 29 de octubre (ATCC) -- Quedo suscrito el dia 27 en Pnom Penh el plan de intercambio cultural para el periodo 2009-2011 entre los gobiernos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y del Reino de Cambodia.
					En la ceremonia de firmas estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana los miembros de la delegacion de amistad del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero presidida por su presidente interino Mun Jae Chol, de visita en Cambodia, y por la contraparte, el ministro de Cultura y Arte, Him Chaem, y otros funcionarios.
